activities:
ACE adheres to Safe Harbor Agreement concerning transfer of personal data from EU to the USA. ACE follows the Safe Harbor Principles published by US Dept. of Commerce with respect to all such data.   

Personal information such as Name and Email Address is collected as part of PelicanPay application users setup which is done by PelicanPay Administrators using the 4 eye principle of multiple associates reviewing for accuracy. The user information is provided by the corporate client during user setup. There is no registration, order form, newsletter, contact us or feedback form.

ACE collects information as part of PelicanPay application under the direction of its Clients, and has no direct relationship with the individuals whose personal data it processes.

ACE collects the following kinds of personal information for ACE's Clients:

•	Contact Information such as name and email address, mailing address, phone number
•	Financial Information such as bank or brokerage account numbers
•	Unique Identifiers such as user name and password

ACE also collects the following information from ACE's Clients:

•	Financial transaction information that may contain company name, address, beneficiary name and address, bank account numbers, balance information, transaction date, transaction amount, national identification number, salary information.

ACE uses this information to:

•	Facilitate transactions on behalf of our Clients through PelicanPay application
•	Send alerts and notifications about account activity to customers of our Clients through PelicanPay application
•	Respond to customer service requests on behalf of our Clients
•	Administer a customer account on behalf of our Clients
•	Provide the financial services you requested on behalf of our Clients
•	Improve our service
•	Conduct research and analysis

In order to facilitate faster processing of transactions, PelicanPay may enrich the transaction data to make the transaction go straight through without manual intervention.

Information sharing to Service Providers
We may transfer personal information to companies that help us provide our service. Transfers to subsequent third parties are covered by the service agreements with our Clients.  We do not sell any personal information to third parties.

Legal Disclaimer
We may also disclose personal information:
•	as required by law, such as to comply with a subpoena, or similar legal process;
•	when we believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, protect the individual or company's safety or the safety of others, investigate fraud, or respond to a government request;
•	if ACE is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of its assets, the individual or company will be notified via email and/or a prominent notice on our Web site of any change in ownership or uses of personal information, as well as any choices the individual or company may have regarding your personal information; and
•	to any other third party with prior consent from the individual or company to do so
  
Retention
We will retain personal data we process on behalf of our Clients for as long as needed to provide services to our Client. ACE will retain and use this personal information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.

Opt-Out Preferences
Receiving emails from PelicanPay is part of our service. If individuals or companies no longer wish to receive these emails, they may opt out of them by contacting our Client who can disable sending emails to the individuals or companies.
